title: New: Elliot Moss – Big Bad Wolf
content:
Soulful R&B infused electronica is all the rage at the moment, yet there’s a fine line between absolutely nailing it, and drowning out any scent of intelligent songwriting with overproduction.

Thankfully for us and for New York’s Elliot Moss he achieves the former. An almost Casiotone For The Painfully Alone style beat is joined by a funky bass line, and Moss’s own Thom Yorke channeling vocals. This is as smooth as it comes, and boy am I enjoying it.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
